laboratory_examinations.findings: Relative hypoperfusion throughout the left cerebral hemisphere.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat SPECT imaging after treatment showed significant improvement with some normalization of relative perfusion to both hemispheres one month after discharge.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 27% decrease in flow rate due to stenosis in the region of the left carotid bifurcation.
Elevated serum ammonia levels of 295 g/dL, decreased to 135 g/dL after treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Treatment of hyperammonemia resulted in a decrease of serum ammonia from 295 to 135 g/dL.
